players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and must be eliminated."
Bob: "Let's be cautious. I'm the mafioso and I've already made my move. We need to gather more information before we make any accusations."
Diana: "I will not make any accusations yet. We need more information to confirm Bob's guilt."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
